issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
In order to ti.newrelic module work, it need to send 'ti.newrelic/4.0/class.rewriter.jar' class library file as -javaagent paramter to java dexer comand but, appcelerator some time load this file some time doesn't need urgent help

h3. Actual Result
appcelerator compiler doesn't load 'class.rewriter.jar' library within build process

h3. Expected Result
'class.rewriter.jar' class should be passed to -javaagent dexer command in order to new relic work on android
fields.summary: Newrelic (Ti.newrelic) module on android doesn't load

comments.body:
Hello, Please provide the module zip file as an attachments to this ticket. We will test the issue in our environment. If we can reproduce the issue we will ascalate the ticket. 

Regards,
Sharif.
